Plot: A murder inside the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years -- which could shake the foundations of Christianity.
Title: The Da Vinci Code
Actors: Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Jean Reno
tomatoConsensus: What makes Dan Brown's novel a best seller is evidently not present in this dull and bloated movie adaptation of The Da Vinci Code.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 21 nominations.
